scripts.install:plugins: npm install --workspace=plugins/calculator && npm install --workspace=plugins/nodecheck && npm install --workspace=plugins/example-plugin
scripts.build:plugins: npm run build --workspace=plugins/calculator && npm run build --workspace=plugins/nodecheck && npm run build --workspace=plugins/example-plugin
scripts.build: npm run build:plugins && npm run build --workspace=CLI/local-cli-fe-full
